englishAnimeSites.editorNotes: Huge library. Can find older and rare shows.
Japanese subtitles are available.  Viewers can toggle subtitles as per their wish. Anyone wishing to learn Japanese from watching anime can use this site.
Requires an account to stream anime.
Clone site of AnimeDao.to created by the owner of GenoAnime.
